ygData.subject: Re: new necro
ygData.msgSnippet: I would also suggest going to befallen, make a pet, explore it. At 51 you shouldnt wory about dying just make sure your pet is at all times behind you. Learn
ygData.messageBody:
I would also suggest going to befallen, make a pet, explore it.
At 51 you shouldnt wory about dying just make sure your pet is at all times
behind you. Learn about pathing with pets ..... this will get you and party
killed.
Patience <spelling> we are not quick kill artist learn to let Dots and pet
do damage over time. Play with lich in newbie zone learn how fast it drains
standing and sitting practice with bond of death and pact of shadow on
newbies. Just make sure you can work that necro before going with a group.

oh yeah your KOS now watch everyone :) and no castle for you.


<< Hiya all, my friend just quit the game and gave me his account. It has a
51 nec, that I don't know how to play hehe. He said he might consider coming
back sometime in the future, so I want to try and get his necro to 60 by then
=) I'm totally new to a necro, but I do have a 49 druid. Any tips on the
necro would be greatly appreciated. Thanks! >>

Zakrell
Tunare
